body.p:
Newport Ky July 2d 1861
To His Excellency
Gov B Magoffin
Dr Sir

Mr W T Waterman who will present to your excellency this letter visits Frankfort to lay before you as a case for executive clemency the petition of Joseph Blakewell I am not acquainted with the facts but take pleasure in stating that Mr. Waterman is a gentleman of high respectability and entitled to confidence in any statement he may make

I am very truly yr friend & obt Sevt
George B Hodge
